Articles.Content: I am not sure... did we have a rollback or something? I just tried to log in with my good ol account that I created somewhere around 2011 and I was told it does not exist... guess I just say "Hi again" then :/
That shouldn't have been effected by the great Derp, of April '13 weird

yeah, I actually thought the same, and I am also relatively sure that I did log in after the derp just fine. ok, I was idle for maybe 3 weeks or so, but that's all... oh well, I will come over it, but knowing what has happened would be nice anyway.
